meanings.definition: The line at which the earth's surface and the sky appear to meet.
meanings.sent1: As the sun set, the colors blended beautifully at the horizons.
meanings.sent2: Every morning, the sun rises above the horizons, bringing light to the world.
meanings.sent3: The birds seemed to play tag with the horizons, flying up and down.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams soared beyond the horizons, reaching for the stars.
meanings.sent5: The horizon's edge shimmered with a golden hue, like a painting come to life.

meanings.definition: The limit of a person's knowledge, experience, or interest.
meanings.sent1: Exploring new books can expand your horizons and teach you new things.
meanings.sent2: She decided to travel to broaden her horizons and see the world.
meanings.sent3: His love for spicy food knows no horizons; he enjoys trying new flavors.
meanings.sent4: The horizon of possibilities seemed endless, waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: Learning a new language can open up horizons to different cultures and perspectives.
